meanings.definition: No longer in use or fashionable.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit was outdated and did not match the current trends.
meanings.sent2: The technology became outdated as newer models were released.
meanings.sent3: He tried to impress his friends with his outdated dance moves.
meanings.sent4: The old car looked like an outdated relic from a bygone era.
meanings.sent5: The dusty library was filled with outdated books that no one read anymore.

meanings.sent1: The antique shop sold many outdated items from the past.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer refused to use outdated patterns in her collection.
meanings.sent3: The teacher's attempt at using an outdated slang term made the students laugh.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were considered outdated by the younger generation.
meanings.sent5: The dusty attic was a treasure trove of outdated artifacts and trinkets.
